overview: Life dealt Bishop a bad hand; born to a crack addicted mother, abused in foster care, homeless, with no hope for a future, yet he grew up to become one of the city's most notorious hustlers. His life of corruption gets challenged when he falls in love with a preacher's daugther. Will she convince Bishop to walk away from his hustlin' lifestyle and choose Christ as his Lord and Savior, or is he in too deep?
title: Leave It At The Altar
